channel.title: [PI] Help please :)
channel.description:
1. Okay what i am trying to do is to make a command that lets u drop only a certain object. for example ::crate and it will drop a crate can any1 give me a working code for what i need please
2. My players can not see what i have dropped for example i ::object 1 they can not see the crate does any1 know how to fix this
3. When i do ::object 1 is there a way i can automatically make it save so it doesn't disappear after
Thanx

item.title: [PI] Help please :)
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

  1. I just quickly made you this command.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("crate") && c.playerRights >= 3) { c.getPA().object(63, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 10); }

  1. & 3. I just came from somewhere and I’m tired, so I gotta think about it when I get free.

Read full topic
